meta.name: Strawpoll
meta.description: Create a strawpoll.
meta.help:
Create a strawpoll on strawpoll.me.
Using the --@@commands.strawpoll.advanced_abbreviation flag allows configuration of advanced options:
multiple votes (default false)
duplication checking (default IP checking)
captcha (default false)

strawpoll.default_footer: Command will be canceled in 15 seconds. Type "cancel" to cancel now. Attempt 1 of 5.
strawpoll.multiple_votes_description: Should users be able to submit multiple votes? @@booleans.yesno.prompt
strawpoll.duplication_checking_description:
How should duplication checking be handled?
`normal` for IP checking, `permissive` for browser cookie checking, `disabled` for no checking.
strawpoll.captcha_description: Should the poll include a captcha? @@booleans.yesno.prompt
no_title: You'll uh.. you'll need a title for that poll there.
It's pretty hard to make a poll without a title.
You gonna ask a question? Polls aren't very useful without questions.
no_options: You probably want some options with that poll, right?
Polls are *extremely* difficult to conduct if people can't answer them. You just get no data. You're sad. People are sad. We're all sad.
strawpoll.too_many_polls: I've created too many polls this hour. Try again later. Sorry 'bout that.
strawpoll.not_enough_options: Minimum two options. Seriously, what's the point in one option? What?
strawpoll.too_many_options: Are you actually insane? Why do you need more than 30 options? Anyways, strollpoll.me won't take it, so I won't take it.
strawpoll.error:
Error while creating poll: $err
Please report this in the support server if you'd like it fixed.

You word.. whatever it is.. is not on the urban dictionary.
Nope. Not even the *urban dictionary* has your word.
ud.footer: Authored by $author | Ratings: +$thumbsup, -$thumbsdown | Hover over links for definitions
ud.catch: The definition was probably too long to fit in a message, sorry, can't send it.

leaderboard.invalid_page: `$page` is not a valid page number.
leaderboard.negative_or_zero_page: There is no page 0 or negative page.
leaderboard.not_enough_people: Not enough people have talked to generate page $page.

meta.name: Leveling Toggle
meta.description: Enable or disable leveling for a server.
meta.help: Simply a toggle for leveling on a server, including all leveling commands. Leveling is disabled by default.

meta.name: XP
meta.description: Show your current XP and level
meta.help: Show current, total, and global XP, your current level, and how close you are to leveling up.

meta.name: XP Info
meta.description: Gives information about Arthur's leveling system.
meta.help: Receive information on Arthur's leveling system, including whether or not it is disabled in the current server and its current settings.

xpinfo.description: Arthur has a leveling system that will give you XP and eventually level you up while you type messages. This is $levels for this server and can be toggled by a server manager with `$prefix@@levels`.
xpinfo.settings_message:
XP revolves around **$base**, for a range of **$min** to **$max** XP per message.
XP is added every **$seconds** seconds.
To achieve level one, you need **$levelOne** XP.
Each level requires **$mult**x as much XP as the previous.
The maximum XP will be multiplied for activity is **$maxMult**x.

meta.name: Blacklist User or Role
meta.description: Blacklist a user or role from using Arthur in your server.
meta.help:
Blacklist a user or role from using Arthur on your server. Give me a user/role ID, mention, tag (username#0000), or role name.
Arthur will not interact with this user in any way, other than like.. notice that they're in a voice channel

blacklist.no_args: Please tell me which user or role to blacklist.
blacklist.invalid: That user or role doesn't, uh, exist. Sorry.
self_blacklist: Hey. I'm not blacklisting you from me. Thanks, but no thanks.
You can't.. you can't do that. At least, I won't let you do that.
Seriously, you don't like me that much? Wow. Alright. I see how it is. Why don't you just kick me then, if that's how it's going to be?
blacklist.self_role_blacklist: You can't blacklist a role you have. I hope you know why.
blacklist.already_blacklisted:
This person or role is already blacklisted.
Go ahead and run `@@unblacklist $id` if you don't want them/it blacklisted anymore. Thanks.
blacklist.blacklisted:
**$tag** has been blacklisted from usage of Arthur in this server. Riperoni in pepperoni.
Should you want to unblacklist, run `@@unblacklist $id`.

meta.name: Leveling Messages
meta.description: Toggle level up messages for your server.
meta.help: Toggle level up messages for your server. By default, level up messages are enabled. Without this command, people will only know of their level in the server using the `@@leaderboard` or `@@xp` commands.

levelmessages.enabled: Level up messages have been enabled for your server.
levelmessages.disabled: Those pesky level up messages have been disabled for your server.

meta.name: Server Language
meta.description: Set the language of Arthur for your server. User settings overwrite.
meta.help: Set the language of Arthur for your server. User settings will overwrite if present. To get a list of languages, use the `@@languages` command. If a language is incomplete, it will use text from English for missing translations. To help translate Arthur, ask Gymno#4741 in the support server (available in the info or help commands).

guildlanguage.invalid_locale: Invalid locale string. Must be one of $locales. For a list of all languages, use the `@@languages` command.

meta.name: Prefix
meta.description: Set or view the server's prefix.
meta.help:
Set or view the server's current prefix for the bot.
You need **Manage Server** or **Administrator** permission to change the prefix.

too_long: That prefix is just a bit too long..
That's a bit too long for me. ~~That's what she said~~. No more than 10 characters.
That's gonna need to be shorter. No sexual reference intended.

meta.name: Unblacklist
meta.description: Unblacklist someone previously blacklisted from Arthur.
meta.help: Unblacklist someone previously blacklisted from Arthur. User ID, tag, nickname, whatever.

no_args: Well? You gonna choose who you want to unblacklist? Or just ~~stand~~ sit there?
I'm on it. I'll unblacklist ` ` right away.
unblacklist.not_blacklisted: That person or role isn't blacklisted. How nice of you, looking out for those who are doing just fine.
unblacklist.unblacklisted: Like magic, **$tag** can interact with me again. :tada:

meta.name: Language
meta.description: Change the language of Arthur for yourself. Overrides server language.
meta.help: Changes the language of Arthur for yourself. Will override server language. The `@@languages` command will provide a list of languages. An incomplete language will use English where there is no translation. To help translate, join the support server and ask about translating.

language.removed: Locale removed. Defaulting to server locale if set, or English.

meta.name: List Languages
meta.description: List all languages that Arthur has available.
meta.help: Lists all languages that Arthur has available, in addition to how completely translated the language is. Languages that are not completely translated will use English where there is no available translation. Help translate Arthur by asking in the support server.

languages.description: Languages that have not been fully translated will use English where translations are missing. To help translate, join the support server. For more info about a language, use the `@@langinfo` command.

meta.name: Language Info
meta.description: Get detailed information about a language.
meta.help: Get detailed information about a language that Arthur has. Use a locale code (e.g. `en-US`). Get a list of all languages, with less detail, with the `@@languages` command.

langinfo.no_language_specified: I can't really get information about a specific language if you don't provide me with said specific language. You can get a list of the available languages with the `@@languages` command. Cheers.
langinfo.locale_not_found: I couldn't find the locale you specified. Make sure you're using the language code (e.g. `en-US`), not the full language name. For a list of languages, use the `@@languages` command.

meta.name: Mp3
meta.description: Get an mp3 file of a YouTube video or Soundcloud song
meta.help: Get an mp3 file of the audio from a YouTube video or a Soundcloud song. Without a direct YouTube or Soundcloud URL, this command will search for the song on YouTube.

mp3.too_long: I've set a limit of $minutes minutes on songs; my CPU is limited and so is your time.
mp3.downloading_with_time: Downloading... This should take about **$seconds** seconds to convert..
mp3.footer: Requested by $tag | File will be deleted after first download.
no_args: It is *exceedingly* hard to download nothing at all and send it to you.
mp3.no_results: The video you searched for does not exist.. rip
mp3.error:
Error converting song: `$err`
Please try again later.
mp3.song_not_found: Unfortunately, I couldn't find that song. You sure it exists?

poll.footer: Command will cancel in 60 seconds. Type "cancel" to cancel now. Attempt 1 of 5.

title.title: Poll title

time.title: Poll time
time.description:

e.g. `2d 8h 3m 14s` (maximum time of one week)

meta.name: Fore skip

meta.name: Like Song
meta.description: Like the currently playing song
meta.help: Likes the currently playing song. View all your likes with the `likes` command.

like.no_song_specified: Alright so if there's no music playing *how am I gonna like the currently playing song*? Eh? You see how that doesn't work?
song_already_liked: Mhm, you think I'm gonna let you like a song twice. No. I don't care how good it is, go get your ~~alt~~ friend to like it.
Bud, you've already liked this song. Ya can't like it twice.
You've already liked that song. Go away.
Must be a nifty song. Regardless of how nifty it is, you can't like it twice, sorry.
like.song_is_playlist: You can't like a whole playlist, sorry.

meta.name: Liked Songs
meta.description: View all your liked songs
meta.help: View all your previously liked songs. Play liked songs with `play liked <number>`.

no_likes: You don't have any likes tho..
You're gonna need to like some songs if ya want me to display some liked songs.
You uh.. You haven't liked a song yet..
invalid_page: Eyy that's not a page number, I'd love it if you'd supply me with a *real* page number, thanks.
That's, uh, not a page number. Give me a real one, perhaps?
You'll need to supply me with a valid page number before I'll supply you with a valid page.
negative_page: Negative pages don't exist, okay? Think of a book. Does said book have a page -3? I didn't think so.
We're still living in three dimensions, as far as I know. I can't generate negative pages.
nonexistent_page: That page doesn't exist yet. Go like a ton of songs, make that page, I believe in you!
You have supplied me with a page that doesn't exist, unfortunately. Perhaps give me one that does? Thanks.
That page, well, it doesn't exist, as sad as that is. Would you be willing to supply me with one that does? Thanks.
The page number you've supplied leads to no page at all. However, if you're dedicated enough, that page could exist one day.
liked.footer: Page $page of $maxPage | Play a liked song with @@play @@commands.likedlb.liked <number>

meta.description: Get a list of the top liked songs.
meta.help: View the top liked songs of the bot.

likedlb.footer: Page $page of $maxPage | Play a top song with @@play @@struct.music.top <number>

meta.name: Loop
meta.description: Loops the current queue of music indefinitely.
meta.help: Toggles looping the music queue

loop.no_music_playing: Ah yes, I'll make sure to loop the nonexistent music. (play some music thanks)
loop.no_permissions: hey you don't have permission to loop the music, weirdo
loop.off: A'ight $name, loops off, as you wish.
loop.on: Loops on, $name, have fun listening to the same song(s) *forever*

meta.name: Move
meta.description: Moves a song at position *a* to position *b*.
meta.help: Moves a song from one position to another. The first position is the song to move, the second position is where to move it to (it will bump the song it replaces up a position).
meta.usage: <queue number of song to move> <position to move to>

move.no_music_playing: There's no music playing right now, so I can't really move songs around.
move.no_permissions: You need higher permissions or the `@@struct.music.dj` or `@@struct.music.music` role to do this.
move.missing_song: Please provide a song queue number to move.
move.missing_position: Please provide a position to move the song to.
move.invalid_song_or_position: The song and/or position provided is invalid; please provide numbers.
move.song_or_position_too_low: You can't move around songs that low in the queue. I won't let ya.
move.song_or_position_too_high: One or more of those queue number(s) is like, out of this world (too big).
move.success: Moved song at position $song to position $pos. Nice.

meta.name: Now Playing
meta.description: See what song is currently playing
meta.help: Get information about the currently playing song.

nothing_playing: Now playing: The sound of silence
There's nothing playing. Nothing at all. Okay?
Now playing: The voices in your head.
Nothing is playing. Go play something. I believe in you.

meta.name: Now Playing Notify
meta.description: Send a message when a new song starts
meta.help: Send a message in the chat where `a.play` was used last showing the currently playing song at the beginning of each song. Toggle with this command or `a.nowplaying notify`.

meta.name: Pause
meta.description: Pause the currently playing song
meta.help: Pause the current song. Requires "@@struct.music.dj" or "@@struct.music.music" role (or the below permissions)

pause.already_paused: The music is already paused. Use `@@resume` to resume playback.

meta.name: Play
meta.description: Play a song or add it to the queue
meta.usage: <song name/youtube or soundcloud url/file url/file/top/liked> [extra params]
meta.help: Play a song or add one to the queue. Only supports songs playable in the US.

play.error_getting_info:
I'm havin' trouble gettin' info for that video - `$err`
report this to my support server if you want it fixed. Or don't. I'm not the boss of you.
not_in_channel: Hey man, I can't just play music through your speakers magically. Could you like.. connect to a voice channel?
You'll have to connect to a voice channel before I can play music, my dude.
Play music where? Likely in a voice channel, right? Right. Now connect to one, so I can play you some music.
You're not connected to a voice channel, so how do I know which voice channel to connect to?
no_song_specified: What? Do you want me to just play some random song? You seriously think I'd do that? No. Choose your song.
Play... what? Choose a song, I believe in you. The internet is a vast and wild place.
Throughout this crazy thing we call the "Internet" there are many, many songs. Now choose one to play, please.
play.cant_join_channel: I can't join the channel you're in. Rude. I wanted to join you, and play you some tunes. The channel I wanted to join wasn't joinable. Do you see this conflict of interests?
play.could_not_connect:
Could not connect to voice channel - `$err`
Try again, if you will. Or go complain in the support server.
play.adding_song_error: An unknown error has occured while adding that song (or songs). The error has been logged and should be resolved soon. Join the support server for more information.
play.footer_extra: Position in queue: $position | Song will play in about $time
play.detected_playlist: I detected a playlist in the link you sent. Would you like to queue all songs from the playlist?
play.playnext_playlist: You cannot use the @@playnext command with a playlist, sorry.

meta.name: Play next
meta.description: Queue a song next in queue
meta.help: Queue a song next in queue, as opposed to added to the end of the queue. See @@play command for proper usage.

meta.name: Queue
meta.description: View the current queue
meta.help: View the current queue. View a different page if there are more than 10 songs.

queue.no_music_queued: There is no music queued. Add some with the `@@play` command.
queue.only_multiple_pages: There are only $pages pages in the queue.
queue.only_one_page: There is only one page in the queue.
queue.footer: Page $page of $maxPage | 1 Song Total | Estimated Queue Length: $length | Requested by $name
queue.footer_plural: Page $page of $maxPage | $songs songs total | Estimated queue length: $length | Requested by $name

meta.name: Remove
meta.description: Remove a song from the queue
meta.help: Remove a song from the queue by it's number. You need "@@struct.music.dj", "@@struct.music.music", the below permissions, or to have added the song yourself to be able remove it.

remove.nothing_playing: I can't remove something from nothing, that breaks some rule of physics.. (There is no music playing)
remove.no_args: Y'all need to specify which song to remove (gimme a number thanks).
remove.not_a_number: Hey.. that's not a number.. (or you chose zero. my point still stands.)
remove.negative_number: there is no negative queue tho <:crazyeyes:359106555314044939>
remove.current_song: hey, use `@@skip`, don't remove the current song, that breaks things..
remove.does_not_exist_yet: C'mon, there aren't that many songs in the queue.. yet.
remove.success:
Success! Song #$num has been removed from the queue.
*someone might have wanted to hear that song, #Blame$name*

meta.description: Resume the currently playing song

resume.nothing_playing: There is no music playing. How would I resume playback of nothing? :thinking:
resume.already_playing: Music is already playing. Use `@@pause` to pause playback.

meta.name: Shuffle

meta.help: Shuffle the current music queue - cannot be undone.

shuffle.no_queue: You want to shuffle the queue, but there is no queue! Queue some music with the `@@play` command.
shuffle.too_small: There's no point in shuffling a one or two song queue - it won't change the order at all. lul.

meta.name: Skip

skipped: $user, you've skipped the song. Nice, I guess.

stopped: Thanks to $user, music has stopped playback.

meta.name: Unlike Song
meta.description: Unlike that one song you liked
meta.help: Unlike that one song you liked a while ago because you now realize it's not as good as you thought it was.

unlike.no_likes: If you haven't liked any songs yet, it's quite challenging for me to unlike a song.
unlike.no_args: Yes, I'll just pick the song you want. Y'know, because I have telepathic powers. (tell me which song to remove)
unlike.invalid_number: Hey.. that's not a number.. (or you chose zero, my point still stands.)
unlike.negative_number: There are no negative songs tho <:crazyeyes:359106555314044939>
unlike.too_high_number: I'm sorry, but you just haven't liked that many songs yet.
unlike.no_voice_connection: You have to tell me which song to unlike, lul.
unlike.song_not_liked: Ey bud you haven't even liked this song yet - how would you unlike it?

meta.name: Help
meta.description: View the help menu.
meta.help: View the entire help menu or just help for one command.

large_embed.description:
Made by Gymno#4741
When using commands, <> indicates a required argument and [] indicates an optional requirement. (Do not actually type these symbols.)
large_embed.footer: Type $prefix@@help <command> for a detailed description of the command

help.send_failed: Message send failed. If you'd like to see the help in this channel, type `$prefix@@help @@commands.help.chat_flag`.
help.invalid_command: I do not have a(n) `$command` command.

sound_effects.help: Alias for `@@play @@struct.music.file $name`. Plays the $name sound effect.

meta.name: Info
meta.description: View information about Arthur.
meta.help: View information about Arthur.

info.title: Arthur - Yet another Discord bot
info.description: Just a bot with tons of.. average features.
info.author: Author
info.info_value:
Language - Javascript
Node $nodeVersion
Discord.js v$discordVersion
Shard uptime of $uptime (shard $shard)
Shard manager uptime of $managerUptime

meta.name: Invite
meta.description: Invite Arthur to your server.
meta.help: Get an invite link for Arthur.

invite.description: Arthur can be invited with [this link]($invite). You need to have @@permissions.MANAGE_SERVER or @@permissions.ADMINISTRATOR permission to add the bot to a server.

meta.name: Dice
meta.description: Rolls a dice
meta.help: Ask Arthur to roll an arbitrarily sized dice

dice.invalid_sides: Hey.. that's not a number.. (or you think zero sided dice exist.)
dice.negative_number: The number provided is the same as the number of brain cells you possess.
dice.excessive_rolls: I can't roll that many dice and neither can you!

meta.name: End poll
meta.description: End a currently started poll early
meta.help:
End a currently started poll early using the poll message ID.
If you want to start a poll, use the `@@poll` command.
To get the poll message ID, turn on developer mode in your discord settings (in the appearance pane), go to the message of the poll (the one Arthur sent with reactions), open the message settings (right click, the three dots, or a long tap depending on platform) and choose "Copy ID." Use this ID in conjunction with this command to end a poll early.

endpoll.no_args: You're gonna have to provide me with the message ID of the poll you'd like to send. Alright? Use `@@help @@endpoll` for details.
endpoll.invalid_args: Please provide a valid message ID. Use `@@help @@endpoll` for further details.
endpoll.invalid_poll: You provided an ID of a poll that no longer exists or never existed, unfortunately. Can't end it. Sorry.
endpoll.wrong_guild: You want to stop a poll in another server? Really? That's like *high* level mischief. N.. no, sorry.
endpoll.finished: You've successfully ended the poll early. Nice.

meta.name: Hug
meta.description: Hug Arthur (or someone else)
meta.help: Hug someone, whether it be Arthur or that guy that wants a hug.

meta.name: Toggle Humongoji
meta.description: Enable or disable humongojis in a server. They're wumbojis, but better.
meta.help:
Wumbojis are bigger emojis that appear when an emoji is in a message by itself. See the [changelog](https://blog.discordapp.com/2016-4-29-change-log-a6451dfbaac8) for when they were added. Humongojis (this feature) are even *bigger* emojis that will appear in the same scenario, where Arthur will show the emoji image in full glorious HD.
If Arthur has the MANAGE_MESSAGES permission, the original message will also be deleted. Humongojis are disabled by default.

humongoji.enabled: Humongojis have been enabled for this server. Enjoy.
humongoji.disabled: As sad as it is for the users of your server, humongojis have been disabled. Riperoni.

meta.name: L
meta.description: L
meta.help: Post an L of Ls, or any other emoji

meta.name: Owoify
meta.description: Owoify some text
meta.help: Owoify some text. Yeah. What even.

owoify.no_text: I can't owoify nothing! Give me some text.

xp.no_one_talked_yet: Belum ada seorang pun di server ini yang berbicara.
xp.level_up: Kerja bagus, $mention, kamu telah mencapai level **$level**!

music.invalid_file_type: I currently only support playback of the filetypes $filetypes. Feel free to suggest more file types if you need 'em.
file_too_small: Your file isn't powerful enough! I need one bigger than 25 KB, thanks.
That file is, hear me out, too small. Really. I'll need something greater than 25 KB. Thanks.
music.no_liked_songs: If you haven't liked a song yet, it's quite challenging for me to play a liked song.
no_song_specified: Yeah, I'll just pick the song you want. Y'know, because I have telepathic powers. (tell me which song to play)
You didn't specify a song. You realize that, right? I can't play a song if you don't specify one.
music.negative_number: there is no negative song tho <:crazyeyes:359106555314044939>
music.number_too_large: I'm sorry, but you just haven't liked that many songs yet. Go do that.
music.number_too_large_lb: There really aren't that many liked songs yet. You could change that if you wanted..
music.could_not_find_song: Not sure why, but I simply couldn't find that song. Huh.
music.no_file_specified: Hey man, you have to tell me what file to play.. The current options are: $files
music.invalid_file: That file uh.. doesn't exist. Feel free to suggest to add it. What you *can* play are as follows: $files
music.invalid_url: Please provide a valid URL (that links to a valid file type).
music.invalid_playlist: The given playlist is invalid or inaccessible. Uh.. sorry.
music.error_loading_playlist_songs: Could not load any songs from given playlist. Wack.
music.playlist_too_long: Sorry, but over 200 songs is too many. Please use a shorter playlist.
no_results: The song you searched for could not be found.. rip
Uhh.. Couldn't find anything by that term, sorry.
You sure that's a real song? ..or video?
Yeah. No. Couldn't find it. Sorry.
could_not_get_info: There seems to have been an error retrieving info for that video. Contact support if the issue persists.
I couldn't get info for that song. Odd. Try again? I dunno.
song_too_short: Your video isn't powerful enough! I need one longer than 5 seconds, thanks.
That video is, hear me out, too short. Really. I'll need one longer than 5 seconds. Thanks.
music.livestream: Trying to play a livestream, eh? Well, no, sorry.
music.video_requires_payment: The video `$video` requires payment to watch. I ain't buyin' that for ya. Skipping.
music.no_audio_track: The video `$video` has no public audio track on YouTube; it's either a paid video or supremely broken. Can't play it for ya.
music.video_unavailable: Video `$video` tidak tersedia. Bisa jadi diblokir oleh hak cipta, batasan usia, diblokir oleh negara, atau cuma YouTube aja yang bertingkah keji. Maaf ya.
music.music_premium: Video `$video` hanya tersedia untuk pelanggan YouTube Music Premium. Itu bukanlah aku. Meloncati.
music.file_footer: Ditambahkan oleh $tag. | URL yang tidak valid akan diloncati.

message.dm_help: Prefiks-ku adalah `a.`; jalankan `a.help` untuk mendapatkan bantuan.
message.invite_help: Untuk mengundang Arthur ke server-mu, gunakan perintah `a.invite`. Sayangnya, bot tidak bisa menggunakan tautan undangan.
message.command_disabled: Saat ini perintah ini dinonaktifkan. Bergabunglah dengan server dukungan untuk informasi lebih lanjut.
message.bot_missing_perms: Aku tidak memiliki perizinan yang diperlukan untuk menjalankan perintah ini: $perms
user_cooldown: Waduh, kamu terlalu cepat untukku. Bisakah kamu santai aja? Tunggu $time detik lagi, ya?
Agak terlalu cepat bagiku. Bisakah kamu menunggu $time detik, dan mencobanya lagi?
Santai aja, gan. Coba lagi dalam $time detik.
Sudah cukup. Terlalu cepat. Ayolah. Pelan-pelan aja. Tunggu $time detik, oke? Harusnya gak susah, kok.
guild_cooldown: Bung, server ini terlalu cepat. Beberapa orang benar-benar perlu bersantai.. Tunggu $time detik lagi, ya?
Beri tahu rekan-rekan anggota server-mu (atau mungkin dirimu sendiri) untuk pelan-pelan, oke? $time detik lagi sebelum kamu bisa menggunakan perintah ini, oke?
Perlu $time detik lagi sebelum server ini bisa menggunakan perintah ini lagi, maaf ya.
Kalian semua terlalu cepat. Coba lagi dalam $time detik, terima kasih.

i18n.response_not_found: Respons tidak ditemukan. Akan diperbaiki secepat mungkin, coba lagi nanti. Nama string, untuk referensi: `$string`.

soundcloud.no_search_results: Aku tidak bisa menemukan lagu apa pun berdasarkan nama tersebut.

perm_levels.0: **Siapa saja** bisa menggunakan perintah ini melalui JAPRI atau di dalam server.
perm_levels.1: **Siapa saja** bisa menggunakan perintah ini melalui JAPRI atau di dalam server.
perm_levels.2: Perintah ini bisa digunakan oleh **siapa saja di dalam server**
perm_levels.3: Hanya orang-orang yang memiliki **Role Mod** atau yang lebih tinggi yang bisa menggunakan perintah ini.
perm_levels.4: Hanya orang-orang yang memiliki **Role Admin** atau yang memiliki **Perizinan Admin** yang bisa menggunakan perintah ini.
perm_levels.5: Hanya orang-orang yang memiliki **Perizinan Kelola Server** atau yang lebih tinggi yang bisa menggunakan perintah ini.
perm_levels.6: Hanya **pemilik server** yang bisa menggunakan perintah ini.
perm_levels.9: Hanya **para pengembang bot** yang bisa menggunakan perintah ini
perm_levels.10: Hanya **pengembang bot utama** yang bisa menggunakan perintah ini.
